thread.title: 19 Classic, Cozy Coats to Get You Through Winter -- The Cut
thread.title_full: 19 Classic, Cozy Coats to Get You Through Winter -- The Cut

author: Lindsay Peoples
title: 19 Classic, Cozy Coats to Get You Through Winter -- The Cut
text:
View Slideshow
Have you had that night yet? That night when the moon disappears behind the clouds, the wind whips across the avenue, and you think, Oh man, I need a new winter coa t? If you haven't, you will soon, which is why we now present you with 19 of the best coats on the market. Click through the slideshow for choices ranging from sporty to preppy — you're bound to find something that will go with a pair of the season's chicest boots .
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
